title: Zimmerman's I95 Landmark Glows Pink for Month of October
text:
FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla., Oct. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Zimmerman, Omnicom's retail growth machine will transform its 130,000 square foot building into a brilliant display of support for breast cancer awareness by lighting up the whole exterior vibrant rays of pink for the entire month of October.
View gallery
. Zimmerman's headquarters is located in the business district off Cypress Creek Road in Fort Lauderdale, where tens of thousands of commuters drive past their agency each day. The agency believes lighting up the building will serve as a powerful demonstration of hope for all of those suffering from breast cancer.
Zimmerman was inspired by long-time client/partner AutoNation and its advertising campaign Drive Pink. In addition to advertising, the automobile giant will be giving out hundreds of thousands of pink license plate frames for display to encourage their customers and associates to help find a cure for the disease. 
"As an agency, our mission is to be relentless in our fight, but never rest in the gloryâ€¦ and this is the most important fight there is. Lighting up our building is something we believe will symbolize our passion for finding a cure and inspire others to do the same," says Founder and Chairman, Jordan Zimmerman.
According to the National Breast Cancer Foundation, the disease is the second leading cause of death in women and nearly one in eight will develop breast cancer over the course of a lifetime. The associates at Zimmerman want to make a difference for those with cancer and are constantly creating innovative ways to show their support. 
About Zimmerman Advertising
Zimmerman Advertising, an Omnicom Group company, is the leading integrated, retail agency in the country. Zimmerman's clients represent some of the most prominent retail brands in the country, including hhgregg, Nissan, Party City, Dunkin' Donuts, Chico's, Tire Kingdom, AutoNation, Firehouse Subs, Boston Market, The Fresh Market and Michaels. Headquartered in South Florida, the agency has retail service offices throughout the country, including New York, Los Angeles, Chicago, Dallas, Atlanta, and Nashville. For information on the agency, visit http://www.zadv.com .
About Omnicom Group
Omnicom Group ( OMC ) is a leading global marketing and corporate communications company. Omnicom's branded networks and numerous specialty firms provide advertising, strategic media planning and buying, direct and promotional marketing, public relations and other specialty communications services to over 5,000 clients in more than 100 countries.
